summary.span: 表示在 Windows 7 工作列縮圖中顯示按鈕之方式的相關資訊。

span.span: Represents information about how to display a button in the Windows 7 taskbar thumbnail.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]工作列提供增強的功能，可讓您使用的工作列按鈕傳達給使用者的狀態，並公開一般工作，視窗最小化或隱藏時。The [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] taskbar provides enhanced functionality that enables you to use the taskbar button to communicate status to a user and expose common tasks when the window is minimized or hidden. 您可以在工作列縮圖，以提供存取一般工作，而不需要切換至 [應用程式] 視窗中加入按鈕。You can add buttons to the taskbar thumbnail to provide access to common tasks without switching to the application window. 比方說，Windows Media Player 會提供您可以使用應用程式最小化時控制媒體播放，從工作列縮圖的播放、 暫停、 轉寄、 及上一步 按鈕。For example, Windows Media Player provides Play, Pause, Forward, and Back buttons that you can use to control media playback from the taskbar thumbnail when the application is minimized. 類別包含屬性，描述如何[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]shell 工作列縮圖中顯示的按鈕。The class contains properties that describe how the [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] shell displays the buttons in the taskbar thumbnail. 它會提供原生 Windows API 的 managed 包裝函式。It provides a managed wrapper around the native Windows API. 物件包含在集合。 objects are contained in the collection. 增強的工作列功能不適用於之前的 Windows 版本比[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]。The enhanced taskbar functionality is not available in versions of Windows earlier than [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]. 在 [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]，某些功能可能無法根據使用者的設定。In [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)], some functionality might not be available depending on the user's settings. 例如，按鈕只會顯示在工作列縮圖時[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aero](~/includes/tlasharptla-aero-md.md)]已啟用。For example, buttons are only shown in the taskbar thumbnail when [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aero](~/includes/tlasharptla-aero-md.md)] is enabled. 您的應用程式應該提供與使用者互動性並非相依於工作列增強的功能的替代方式。Your application should provide alternate ways of interacting with the user that are not dependent on the enhanced taskbar functionality. 下圖顯示了帶有兩個拇指按鈕的任務欄預覽，這兩個拇指按鈕可用於訪問“播放”和“停止”命令。The following illustration shows a taskbar preview with two thumb buttons that provide access to the Play and Stop commands. ![工作列項目資訊範例](~/add/media/wpfshell-taskbariteminfo.png "工作列項目資訊範例")![Taskbar Item Info Sample](~/add/media/wpfshell-taskbariteminfo.png "Taskbar Item Info Sample") Windows 工作列縮圖按鈕Windows Taskbar Thumb Buttons ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立標記中。The following example shows how to create a in markup. 包含的集合從工作列項目提供存取權的婧矔菛 Stop 命令的物件。The contains a collection of objects that provide access to the Play and Stop commands from the taskbar item. 這個範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-xaml[Shell_TaskbarItemSample#010](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_taskbaritemsample/cs/mainwindow.xaml#010)]

summary.span: 發生於按一下縮圖按鈕時。

span.span: Occurs when the thumbnail button is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您處理而不是執行的事件，事件處理常式，繫結至縮圖按鈕。If you handle the event, the event handler executes instead of any that is bound to the thumbnail button.

summary.span: 取得或設定按一下這個縮圖按鈕時要叫用的命令。

span.span: Gets or sets the command to invoke when this thumbnail button is clicked.

value.span: 當按一下這個縮圖按鈕時所要叫用的命令。

span.span: The command to invoke when this thumbnail button is clicked.

value.span: 預設為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您處理而不是執行的事件，事件處理常式，繫結至縮圖按鈕。If you handle the event, the event handler executes instead of any that is bound to the thumbnail button. 在 XAML 中，此屬性通常設定為靜態命令的值，其中一個現有的指令程式庫，例如，從或程式庫。In XAML, this property is often set to be a static command value from one of the existing command libraries, such as from the or library. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立標記中。The following example shows how to create a in markup. 繫結至命令。The is bound to the command. 這個範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 取得或設定縮圖按鈕工具提示要顯示的文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the text to display for the thumbnail button tooltip.

value.span: 縮圖按鈕工具提示要顯示的文字。

span.span: The text to display for the thumbnail button tooltip.

value.span: 預設為空字串。

span.span: The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以將映像新增至縮圖的按鈕，但沒有屬性存在，在縮圖按鈕表面上設定的文字。You can add an image to a thumbnail button, but no property exists for setting text on the thumbnail button face. 不過，您可以設定屬性，以新增當滑鼠指標移至縮圖按鈕時，會顯示在工具提示的描述性文字。However, you can set the property to add descriptive text that is displayed in a tooltip when the mouse pointer moves over the thumbnail button. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立標記中。The following example shows how to create a in markup. 繫結至命令。The is bound to the command. 工具提示的描述性文字**停止**。The tooltip descriptive text is **Stop**. 這個範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-xaml[Shell_TaskbarItemSample#020](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_taskbaritemsample/cs/mainwindow.xaml#020)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示是否在按一下縮圖按鈕時關閉工作列縮圖。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the taskbar thumbnail closes when the thumbnail button is clicked.

value.span: 如果關閉縮圖，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the thumbnail closes; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，工作列縮圖保持可見的按一下縮圖按鈕時。By default, the taskbar thumbnail remains visible when a thumbnail button is clicked. 按一下縮圖按鈕時關閉縮圖，請設定屬性設`true`。To make the thumbnail close when a thumbnail button is clicked, set the property to `true`. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立標記中。The following example shows how to create a in markup. 繫結至命令。The is bound to the command. 它會設定為在按下按鈕時關閉。It is configured to close when the button is clicked. 這個範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-xaml[Shell_TaskbarItemSample#020](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_taskbaritemsample/cs/mainwindow.xaml#020)]

summary.span: 取得或設定顯示在縮圖按鈕上的影像。

span.span: Gets or sets the image that is displayed on the thumbnail button.

value.span: 顯示在縮圖按鈕上的影像。

span.span: The image that is displayed on the thumbnail button.

value.span: 預設為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以將靜態或以動畫顯示縮圖按鈕上。You can place a static or animated on the thumbnail button. 影像會呈現在適當的大小。The images are rendered at the appropriate size. 如果代表，也會使用適當的位元深度。If the represents an , the appropriate bit depth is also used. 若要提供其他有關縮圖按鈕的文字資訊，請設定屬性。To provide additional textual information about the thumbnail button, set the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立標記中。The following example shows how to create a in markup. 繫結至命令。The is bound to the command. 按鈕影像是暗灰色方形為靜態資源的 XAML 中定義。The button image is a dark gray square defined in XAML as a static resource. 這個範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-xaml[Shell_TaskbarItemSample#020](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_taskbaritemsample/cs/mainwindow.xaml#020)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示是否在縮圖按鈕周圍顯示框線及反白。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a border and highlight is displayed around the thumbnail button.

value.span: 如果在縮圖按鈕周圍顯示框線及反白，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if a border and highlight is displayed around the thumbnail button; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，框線周圍會出現，而且滑鼠指標移至縮圖按鈕時，會顯示反白顯示。By default, a border appears around the , and a highlight is displayed when the mouse pointer is moved over the thumbnail button. 若只要顯示沒有框線及反白顯示，設定屬性設`false`。To display only the without the border and highlight, set the property to `false`. 如果已`false`，則仍然會轉移至提供視覺化回饋給使用者按一下縮圖按鈕時。If is `false`, the still shifts when the thumbnail button is clicked to provide visual feedback to the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性是`false`，在縮圖按鈕不會回應事件和會呈暗灰色。When the property is `false`, the thumbnail button does not respond to events and the is dimmed.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示使用者是否可以和縮圖按鈕互動。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the user can interact with the thumbnail button.

value.span: 如果使用者可以和縮圖按鈕互動，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the user can interact with the thumbnail button; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性是`false`，在縮圖按鈕不會回應事件。When the property is `false`, the thumbnail button does not respond to events. 不過，未呈現灰色。However, the is not dimmed. 您可以使用不是互動式狀態圖示為縮圖按鈕。You can use a thumbnail button that is not interactive as a status icon. 如果屬性是`false`，則設定為並沒有任何影響。If the property is `false`, the setting for does not have any effect.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值指定縮圖按鈕的顯示狀態。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the display state of the thumbnail button.

value.span: 列舉值，這個值指定縮圖按鈕的顯示狀態。

span.span: An enumeration value that specifies the display state of the thumbnail button.

value.span: 預設為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，縮圖按鈕是。By default, the thumbnail button is . [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] 在工作列縮圖中，可讓最多七個按鈕。allows a maximum of seven buttons in the taskbar thumbnail. 當屬性設定為、 縮圖按鈕具有任何可見的項目，但名額仍保留給它。When the property is set to , the thumbnail button has no visible elements, but space is still reserved for it. 縮圖按鈕時它並沒有任何可見的項目，它會保留任何空間。When the thumbnail button is , it does not have any visible elements and no space is reserved for it. 在此情況下，額外的縮圖按鈕集合會顯示。In this case, additional thumbnail buttons in the collection are displayed.
